channel.title: Travel on Quests Of The Nomad
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Quests Of The Nomad

item.title: Welcome to my Travel Blog!
item.description: Wondering, another travel blog, just another person writing his travel experiences. Meh! Pass or not to pass? Decide it yourself :) Hi there, Yesterday was the beginning & tomorrow there will be an end though somewhere in the middle we have to focus on things we need to do. Somewhere around August 2018 with a broken clavicle and a month of bed rest, was when I decided to start blogging and it took me around 6 months to actually start a travel blog.
